column4: ok folks...I don't have electricsheep installed and I downloaded deb file for the new electricsheep 2.6 and did sudo dpkg -i electricsheep_2.6.2-1~hoary1_i386.deb and during the proccess of installing it errors out saying it can't overwrite /usr/share/xscreensaver/config/electricsheep.xml...anyone tell me how to fix this?
you run itn with sudo, right?
the ubuntu live cd is sortof slow, but it should run good anyway
